bibl.title: Coptic Ostraca from Hagr Edfu.
bibl.note: 1. Fragments of a writing exercise: grouped lines and isolated words. - 2. Ostracon with writing exercise: isolated letters and syllables. - 3. Ostracon with writing exercise: isolated letters, syllables, set phrases, and book-hand.

bibl.title: Christianity and Monasticism in Aswan and Nubia.

bibl.seg: 142.13 O. Hagr Edfu sans No. d'Inv. descr.
Anke Ilona Blöbaum, Coptic Ostraca from Hagr Edfu.
Gawdat Gabra & Hany N. Takla (edd.), Christianity and Monasticism in Aswan and Nubia (Cairo - New York, 2013) pp. 1-7, 3 figg.

1. Fragments of a writing exercise: grouped lines and isolated words. - 2. Ostracon with writing exercise: isolated letters and syllables. - 3. Ostracon with writing exercise: isolated letters, syllables, set phrases, and book-hand.
